Texts.Eng: The download is finished! I can now craft a variety of Trinkian items, and it looks like there's a blueprint for a new, ^orange;unique weapon ^white;in here, too!

The file size for this ^orange;Trinkian Crafting Guide ^white;is substantially larger than I thought... I'll need a ^orange;Circuit Data Drive ^white;to download it all. Trinkian merchants often sell these items: ^green;I should check around the settlement for someone selling such a drive^white;.
